infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow EmoGo to access your camera to record vlogs.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow EmoGo to access your microphone to record vlogs.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow EmoGo to use your location to track where you record your emotions.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow EmoGo to save your vlogs to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allow EmoGo to save your vlogs to your photo library.
